happy_paths.scenario: valid source and target classes with cloneable schedules
happy_paths.expectation: returns created/skipped/conflicts with success message unchanged
increments skipped and appends conflict objects with same keys kelas_id, kelas_name, conflict_type, message
guru/ruang assignment semantics preserved during insert

response_contract: sendSuccessResponse(res, { created, skipped, conflicts }, "Jadwal berhasil disalin") unchanged
created and skipped counters still computed per target x schedule loop
